text_raw:
4. The form set out in the Schedule is prescribed as the form of declaration 
to be signed by a relevant person and given to An Coimisiún Pleanála under 
section 523(1) of the Principal Act. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 24th June, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [262] 3 

Regulation 4 

Schedule 

PLANNING AND DEVELOPMENT ACT 2024 

SECTION 523 

Form No. 1 

Declaration of relevant person to An Coimisiún Pleanála of interest in land or 
maritime site 

I, ___________________________, hereby make and give to An Coimisiún 
Pleanála the following declaration of interests in compliance with the 
requirements of section 523 of the Planning and Development Act 2024: 

(a) Particulars of any legal or beneficial interest I have in land or a 

maritime site: 

_______________________________________________________________
_______________________________________________________________ 

[see, in particular, clauses (1), (2) & (3) in the instructions below for completing 
this form] 

(b) Particulars of any business of dealing in or developing land or a 
maritime site in which I am engaged or employed and any such 
business carried on by a company or other body of which I am, or 
any nominee or trustee of mine is, a member: 

_______________________________________________________________
_______________________________________________________________ 

[see, in particular, clauses (1) & (3) in the instructions below for completing this 
form] 

(c) Particulars of any profession, business or occupation in which I 
am engaged, whether on my own behalf or otherwise, and which 
relates to dealing in or developing land or a maritime site: 

_______________________________________________________________
_______________________________________________________________ 

[see, in particular, clauses (1) & (3) in the instructions below for completing this 
form] 

I hereby declare that the foregoing is a true and complete declaration of every 
interest of mine which is an interest to which section 523 of the Planning and 
Development Act 2024 applies. 

Signature: ______________________Date: __________________________ 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [262] 

INSTRUCTIONS FOR COMPLETING THIS FORM 

(1) Where relevant, include the location of the land or maritime site and the 
area of the planning authority in which the land or maritime site concerned is 
situated. 

(2) Include the following: 

(a) 

any interest held by you, or by any nominee of yours, including 
where you or your nominee, is a member of a company or other 
body which has such an interest, in— 

(i) 

a contract for the purchase of land or a maritime site, 
whether or not a deposit or part payment has been made 
under the contract, and 

(ii) 

any interest in— 

(I) an option to purchase land or a maritime site, whether 
or not any consideration has been paid in respect of 
the option, or 

(II) land or a maritime site in respect of which such an 
option has been exercised but which has not yet been 
conveyed, 

other than any interest in land or a maritime site consisting of your 
private home or the private home of your spouse or civil partner, 
that is to say, a building or part of a building that is occupied by 
you (or by your spouse or civil partner or a child of you or your 
spouse or civil partner) as a separate dwelling and any garden or 
other land usually occupied with the dwelling, being land that is 
subsidiary or ancillary to it, is required for its amenity or 
convenience and is not being used or developed primarily for 
commercial purposes. 

(3) Where no interest is held by you, or by your nominee, insert “None”. 

(4) Subject to clauses (5) and (6) of these instructions, this declaration shall 

be made and given by you— 

(a) within 28 days of the day on which you become a person required 
to make and give a declaration under section 523(1) of the 
Planning and Development Act 2024, and 

(b) 

thereafter, at least annually. 

(5) Notwithstanding clause (4) of these instructions, you shall, where— 

(a) 

there is a change regarding an interest contained in a declaration 
made under subsection (1) of section 523 of the Planning and 
Development Act 2024, or 

(b) 

another interest referred to in paragraph (a), (b) or (c) of this form 
is acquired by you, 

give to the Coimisiún a further declaration under that subsection (1) in respect 
of that change or interest within 10 working days of the day on which the change 
occurs or the other interest is acquired. 

 [262] 5 

(6) You shall not be regarded as having an interest referred to in paragraph 
(a), (b) or (c) of this form, if the interest is so remote or insignificant that it cannot 
reasonably be regarded as likely to influence you in considering or discussing, 
or in voting on, any question with respect to any matter arising or coming before 
the Coimisiún or in performing any function in relation to any such matter. 

(7) Where you have an interest referred to in paragraph (a), (b) or (c) of this 
form by reason only of the beneficial ownership of shares in a company or other 
body by you, or by your nominee or trustee, and the total value of those shares 
does not exceed the lesser of— 

(a) 

€13,000, or 

(b) one-hundredth part of the total nominal value of either the issued 
share capital of the company or body or, where that capital is 
issued in shares of more than one class, the issued share capital of 
the class or classes of shares in which you, or your nominee or 
trustee, has an interest, 

subsections (1) and (3) of section 523 of the Planning and Development Act 
2024 shall not apply in relation to that interest. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

18 June, 2025. 

JAMES BROWNE, 

Minister for Housing, Local Government and Heritage.

EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

In exercise of the powers conferred on the Minister for Housing, Local 
Government and Heritage by sections 4(1) and 523(1) and (12) of the Planning 
and Development Act 2024 (No. 34 of 2024), these Regulations are made by that 
Minister to prescribe certain relevant persons and the form of declaration of 
interests to be completed by relevant persons of An Coimisiún Pleanála.
